content: crochet a little love bug for valentine s day quick and easy pattern with minimal sewing and embroidered heart details perfect for keychains magnets and brooches makes a sweet gift for kid s to give to their friends or for selling at markets the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found ** here 1 ** on my blog **materials** * dk weight yarn * 2 5mm crochet hook * 4 ply yarn in black or black embroidery floss * white embroidery floss * polyester fiberfill * yarn needle stitch marker scissors the finished item measures approximately 1 5 wide x 1 75 long 4cm x 4 5cm item size may vary depending on the materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/love-bug-crochet-pattern/
